data.name: Soundtrack and Director's Commentary
data.detailed_description:
The “Heart and Seoul” Official Soundtrack features music composed and produced by Antonio Lorenzo Carino. Relive this exciting romantic and holiday story through the vibrant, à la mode and rich melodies that served as the background setting of this visual novel.

Track List
01 - Heart and Seoul Main Theme.mp3
02 - Art and Culture.mp3
03 - Take it Easy.mp3
04 - The Cafe.mp3
05 - La Bouteille Rouge.mp3
06 - Late Night Drinks.mp3
07 - Creatures of the Night.mp3
08 - Romance in the Air.mp3
09 - The Poem.mp3
